title: WTB Type-1 Red Cross any condition
author: jggames

posts.post_title: WTB Type-1 Red Cross any condition
posts.post_content:
A long shot post for sure, but I’m trying to round out my rareback binder collection and would love to add a Red Cross. Please let me know if you might sell one.

Thank you!
Friendly bump on this. Would love to add one to my binder collection, absolutely any condition will work for me! Thank you
